'''Aphotium Ores''' are event items for the ''[[Three Realms Gateway Offering]]'' [[Event]]. The darkness shrouding Aphotium Ore can be dispersed using the [[Bokuso Box]]. Once the Bokuso Box is upgraded to Level 1, their locations are marked on the minimap, like how a [[Minerals#Talents|Mineral Utility Passive]] would.

It is used alongside [[Tokoyo Legume]] to unseal the [[Teleport Waypoints]] throughout the map of ''[[Three Realms Gateway Offering]]''.

==Trivia==
* "Aphotium" likely derives from "aphotic" with the suffix {{wt|-ium||English}}. The {{w|aphotic zone}} is the deeper portion of lakes or oceans where there is little to no sunlight, reflecting the "Deep Sea" portion of the Chinese name.
